name: Online Multiplayer Hide and Seek - Prop Hunt
name_original: Online Multiplayer Hide and Seek - Prop Hunt
description:
*YOU 100% NEED TO BE TWO PLAYERS (ONLINE) OR YOU CAN'T PLAY* *PLEASE Play fullscreen for best results & stay on the page while playing

A funny online multiplayer prop hunt game ! Also called hide ans seek !

You can play it in browser ! it's 1v1 one hide and the other search !

Controls :

Move : WASD or arrow keys
Jump : Space
Shoot // Become object : Left click

RULES :

Proie = Prey

Chasseur = Hunter

Proie :
You have 25 sec to hide !
Clic on any object when you are the prey to become the object !
Every 30 sec you whistle and every 60 sec you jump

Chasseur :
You have 9 bullets to kill the Proie
